Group_Integral Property

CDXML Name:Integral
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Group_Integral
CDX Constant Value:0x1100
Data Size:CDXBoolean
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Group
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0
Required?No

Description:

The group is considered to be integral (non-subdivisible) if non-zero.

An Integral Group is always treated as a single, non-subdivisible object for the purposes of interactions with the user. Selection of any submember of the group will cause all group members to become selected

If this property is absent:

The group is not considered to be integral.
